archimate:Goal.name: Pipeline for deploying Tietoevry Connect management services
archimate:Goal.documentation:
Allows Tietoevry Connect organization units to built a blueprint for their solutions and then use those to deploy on top of the Foundation Platform.
- Within the process, a blueprint for the management environment will be build - Blueprint can then be used to deploy the management environment on top of any TEMA instance - Build once, deploy many will increase the quality and speed up the delivery for example due in-country requirements
